channel.title: Voule Auto Restarter
channel.description:
When I run it, it says
"'tskill' is not recognized as an internal or external command."
@echo off cls tskill java /a cd ../bin color 0a Title Andrickscape 508 "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe" Andrickscape/Server 43594 cls
what do i put to make it work???

item.title: Voule Auto Restarter
item.dc:creator: @billyjr33 billyjr33
item.description:
@billyjr33 wrote:

just get a new auto restarter

here’s one if you want it: http://www.mediafire.com/?lzdtm3geyty

or add this to yours

@echo off cls echo Voule Auto restart tskill java /a echo Restarting server title Project Reality "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_16\bin\java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server cls

Read full topic

item.title: Voule Auto Restarter
item.dc:creator: @andrickscape andrickscape
item.description:
@andrickscape wrote:

When I run it, it says

“‘tskill’ is not recognized as an internal or external command.”

@echo off
cls
tskill java /a
cd …/bin
color 0a
Title Andrickscape 508
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_18\bin\java.exe” Andrickscape/Server 43594
cls

what do i put to make it work???

Read full topic
